issue.title: [Rust] Filter kernel does not support temporal types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7887](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7887). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Filter kernel does not have support for date / time / duration / timestamp types.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7887?focusedCommentId=17041592) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6455
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6455>
